```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(PCNR)
```

## Build a PCN from a PDB ID

```{r}
pcn <- try(pcn_from_pdb("2K0A", chain = "A", atom = "CA", cutoff = 7), silent = TRUE)
if (!inherits(pcn, "try-error")) {
  plot_pcn(pcn$graph)
  head(pcn_metrics(pcn))
  pcn_summary(pcn)
}
```
